title: Hot Lava
notes: Performance is okay, I need to use Medium graphics quality; First start takes around 30seconds with no response, but works afterwards,

title: Hot Lava
notes: Performance is great, and I can run at highest graphics settings. Changing the resolution seems to be a bit unresponsive. Game runs well fullscreen and in windowed mode.
Initial startup time is a bit long, but after that there are no problems with the game.
